Subject: RE: Water leakage issue Michael Kors Dubai Mall. ‼️ 

 

Dear Cherry,

 

Based on our discussion, I am mentioning down the list of damages that has occurred to our shop due to the heavy water leakage that occurred today morning.

Although the water is completely drained and cleared from the shop above and currently there is only minor drops falling as the ceiling concrete slab for our store is still wet due to the leakage. Hence, kindly ensure a cleaner is deployed on short intervals to vacuum the area of carpet near the fitting room since it is connected to the shop floor area, and can start to cause bad odour due to the wet dampness of the carpet.

 

Listing down the damages in Michael Kors, TDM shop due to the water leakage.

*	Fitting room gypsum ceiling portion        - approx 8 sqm
*	Gypsum wall portion                                   - approx 4 sqm
*	Ceiling spot lights                                         - 4 nos (Italian make lights)
*	Emergency lights                                          - 2 nos 
*	Smoke detector                                            - 2 nos 
*	Door frame                                                   - wet and showing no physical damage now, but will bulge in short time 
*	60x60 BOh ceiling tiles                                - 4 pc
*	60x60 ceiling light                                        - 1 no
*	Carpet                                                            – 2m x 1.5m approx

	Subject: Water leakage issue Michael Kors Dubai Mall. ‼️ 

	 

	Dear Cherry,

	 

	I hope this email finds you well.

	 

	I wanted to bring to your attention a water leakage issue that we are currently experiencing at one of our stores, Michael Kors DM. After investigating, I have identified that the leakage is originating from the roof slab.

	 

	As discussed, we require your urgent support in resolving this matter as a priority. Your prompt action on this would be greatly appreciated to avoid any further damage or disruption.

	 

	Please let me know the next steps and timeline for addressing the issue.

Subject: RE: Water leakage issue Michael Kors Dubai Mall. ‼️ 

 

Dear Cherry,

 

Based on our discussion, I am mentioning down the list of damages that has occurred to our shop due to the heavy water leakage that occurred today morning.

Although the water is completely drained and cleared from the shop above and currently there is only minor drops falling as the ceiling concrete slab for our store is still wet due to the leakage. Hence, kindly ensure a cleaner is deployed on short intervals to vacuum the area of carpet near the fitting room since it is connected to the shop floor area, and can start to cause bad odour due to the wet dampness of the carpet.

 

Listing down the damages in Michael Kors, TDM shop due to the water leakage.

*	Fitting room gypsum ceiling portion        - approx 8 sqm
*	Gypsum wall portion                                   - approx 4 sqm
*	Ceiling spot lights                                         - 4 nos (Italian make lights)
*	Emergency lights                                          - 2 nos 
*	Smoke detector                                            - 2 nos 
*	Door frame                                                   - wet and showing no physical damage now, but will bulge in short time 
*	60x60 BOh ceiling tiles                                - 4 pc
*	60x60 ceiling light                                        - 1 no
*	Carpet                                                            – 2m x 1.5m approx

	Subject: Water leakage issue Michael Kors Dubai Mall. ‼️ 

	 

	Dear Cherry,

	 

	I hope this email finds you well.

	 

	I wanted to bring to your attention a water leakage issue that we are currently experiencing at one of our stores, Michael Kors DM. After investigating, I have identified that the leakage is originating from the roof slab.

	 

	As discussed, we require your urgent support in resolving this matter as a priority. Your prompt action on this would be greatly appreciated to avoid any further damage or disruption.

	 

	Please let me know the next steps and timeline for addressing the issue.

I hope you are doing well.

 

 

Please note that, Following my discussion with the project team regarding the fitting room carpet, it was confirmed that the carpet was originally supplied by the brand. Hence, As we discussed could you please coordinate with brand to obtain a quote for the carpet supply . This will allow us to present all the necessary quotes together for the insurance claim.

 

In the meantime, I will be preparing the quote for the carpet installation work as well. 

 

 

Best Regards

r.Nassik@chalhoub.com <mailto:Kawttar.Nassik@chalhoub.com> >; Samer Kaidbey <Samer.Kaidbey@chalhoub.com <mailto:Samer.Kaidbey@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: RE: Water leakage issue Michael Kors Dubai Mall. ‼️ 

 

Dear Cherry,

 

Based on our discussion, I am mentioning down the list of damages that has occurred to our shop due to the heavy water leakage that occurred today morning.

Although the water is completely drained and cleared from the shop above and currently there is only minor drops falling as the ceiling concrete slab for our store is still wet due to the leakage. Hence, kindly ensure a cleaner is deployed on short intervals to vacuum the area of carpet near the fitting room since it is connected to the shop floor area, and can start to cause bad odour due to the wet dampness of the carpet.

 

Listing down the damages in Michael Kors, TDM shop due to the water leakage.

*	Fitting room gypsum ceiling portion        - approx 8 sqm
*	Gypsum wall portion                                   - approx 4 sqm
*	Ceiling spot lights                                         - 4 nos (Italian make lights)
*	Emergency lights                                          - 2 nos 
*	Smoke detector                                            - 2 nos 
*	Door frame                                                   - wet and showing no physical damage now, but will bulge in short time 
*	60x60 BOh ceiling tiles                                - 4 pc
*	60x60 ceiling light                                        - 1 no
*	Carpet                                                            – 2m x 1.5m approx

	Dear Cherry,

	 

	I hope this email finds you well.

	 

	I wanted to bring to your attention a water leakage issue that we are currently experiencing at one of our stores, Michael Kors DM. After investigating, I have identified that the leakage is originating from the roof slab.

	 

	As discussed, we require your urgent support in resolving this matter as a priority. Your prompt action on this would be greatly appreciated to avoid any further damage or disruption.

	 

	Please let me know the next steps and timeline for addressing the issue.

r.Nassik@chalhoub.com <mailto:Kawttar.Nassik@chalhoub.com> >; Samer Kaidbey <Samer.Kaidbey@chalhoub.com <mailto:Samer.Kaidbey@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: RE: Water leakage issue Michael Kors Dubai Mall. ‼️

 

Dear Cherry,

 

Based on our discussion, I am mentioning down the list of damages that has occurred to our shop due to the heavy water leakage that occurred today morning.

Although the water is completely drained and cleared from the shop above and currently there is only minor drops falling as the ceiling concrete slab for our store is still wet due to the leakage. Hence, kindly ensure a cleaner is deployed on short intervals to vacuum the area of carpet near the fitting room since it is connected to the shop floor area, and can start to cause bad odour due to the wet dampness of the carpet.

 

Listing down the damages in Michael Kors, TDM shop due to the water leakage.

*	Fitting room gypsum ceiling portion        - approx 8 sqm
*	Gypsum wall portion                                   - approx 4 sqm
*	Ceiling spot lights                                         - 4 nos (Italian make lights)
*	Emergency lights                                          - 2 nos
*	Smoke detector                                            - 2 nos
*	Door frame                                                   - wet and showing no physical damage now, but will bulge in short time
*	60x60 BOh ceiling tiles                                - 4 pc
*	60x60 ceiling light                                        - 1 no
*	Carpet                                                            – 2m x 1.5m approx

	Subject: Water leakage issue Michael Kors Dubai Mall. ‼️

	 

	Dear Cherry,

	 

	I hope this email finds you well.

	 

	I wanted to bring to your attention a water leakage issue that we are currently experiencing at one of our stores, Michael Kors DM. After investigating, I have identified that the leakage is originating from the roof slab.

	 

	As discussed, we require your urgent support in resolving this matter as a priority. Your prompt action on this would be greatly appreciated to avoid any further damage or disruption.

	 

	Please let me know the next steps and timeline for addressing the issue.

r.Nassik@chalhoub.com <mailto:Kawttar.Nassik@chalhoub.com> >; Samer Kaidbey <Samer.Kaidbey@chalhoub.com <mailto:Samer.Kaidbey@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: RE: Water leakage issue Michael Kors Dubai Mall. ‼️

 

Dear Cherry,

 

Based on our discussion, I am mentioning down the list of damages that has occurred to our shop due to the heavy water leakage that occurred today morning.

Although the water is completely drained and cleared from the shop above and currently there is only minor drops falling as the ceiling concrete slab for our store is still wet due to the leakage. Hence, kindly ensure a cleaner is deployed on short intervals to vacuum the area of carpet near the fitting room since it is connected to the shop floor area, and can start to cause bad odour due to the wet dampness of the carpet.

 

Listing down the damages in Michael Kors, TDM shop due to the water leakage.

*	Fitting room gypsum ceiling portion        - approx 8 sqm
*	Gypsum wall portion                                   - approx 4 sqm
*	Ceiling spot lights                                         - 4 nos (Italian make lights)
*	Emergency lights                                          - 2 nos
*	Smoke detector                                            - 2 nos
*	Door frame                                                   - wet and showing no physical damage now, but will bulge in short time
*	60x60 BOh ceiling tiles                                - 4 pc
*	60x60 ceiling light                                        - 1 no
*	Carpet                                                            – 2m x 1.5m approx

	Subject: Water leakage issue Michael Kors Dubai Mall. ‼️

	 

	Dear Cherry,

	 

	I hope this email finds you well.

	 

	I wanted to bring to your attention a water leakage issue that we are currently experiencing at one of our stores, Michael Kors DM. After investigating, I have identified that the leakage is originating from the roof slab.

	 

	As discussed, we require your urgent support in resolving this matter as a priority. Your prompt action on this would be greatly appreciated to avoid any further damage or disruption.

	 

	Please let me know the next steps and timeline for addressing the issue.
